import React from 'react' const Certification = ({textColor,bg,main,rightbg}) => { return (

Certification

  • Mar 2024

    Web Development

    I-Tech Computer Classes

  • Jan 2024

    C/C++

    I-Tech Computer Classes

  • Mar 2024

    Web Development

    Courseera

  • Mar 2024

    Enhancing Soft Skill

    NPTEL

  • Mar 2024

    Soft Skill Development

    NPTEL
) } export default Certification
